dc:title: On Pilgrimage - November 1957
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Attends a conference of experts who ponder the meaning of altruistic love and isn't impressed with their rationality and science. Visits families living on the land and points to the need for community for them to survive. Shares in celebrating the twentieth anniversary of the Detroit Catholic Worker houses.
